${ModID}:BlessingHeaven.NAME: Blessing of Heaven
${ModID}:BlessingHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Exhaust.
${ModID}:BlessingHeaven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP. Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlessingEarth.NAME: Blessing of Earth
${ModID}:BlessingEarth.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlessingMan.NAME: Blessing of Man
${ModID}:BlessingMan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies !M! times. Exhaust.
